text: I will not stand by and watch my people suffer while you discuss this in a commitee!
Interesting my old post on Google and Theory of Mind is getting some readership again since Knol launched. http://icanhaz.com/theoryofmind
Today is one of those days that reminds me why I usually use the word "surprise" only as a really negative adjective.
It never ceases to amaze me that there are people who will list their ignorance of a topic as part of their credentials for opining on it.
Enjoying being in that profoundly stuporous state of extreme jetlag where I find even my own sentences incomprehensible.
Muzak in this store is playing Michael Bolton' violent assault of "When a Man Loves a Woman". Are hipsters going to start embracing this?
Good news: If you go to bed early enough, it's easy to get up early on a Sunday. Bad news: Up early on a Sunday OMG WTF BBQ?!
Staten Island Apple store seems better laid-out than any of the Manhattan ones.
Every company turns to a blog when they're in a crisis. Even Apple: http://www.apple.com/mobileme/status/
Rafe and Tim are right: The current flat Apple keyboards might be the best hardware they've ever made. http://icanhaz.com/applekeys
Fascinating how many people are wearing t-shirts with the logo from the 1989 Batman movie when every film since then has had a new logo.
It's not hard to strike up a conversation with a stranger if he's wearing a D'Angelo "Voodoo" t-shirt.
Twitter's missed an opportunity: Any time a feature or count is turned off or degraded, tell people you're removing clutter in their lives.
@photomatt i went through the same reckoning when Lil Wayne first did his track with Robin Thicke. He's impossible to dislike!
So whatever happened to that Fugees reunion? Lauryn too crazy, Wyclef too corny, or Pras simply too unbelievably wack?
@daveman692 onstage with Zuck at Facebook's F8 killing it with Movable Type + Facebook Connect! Great demo, man :)
Enjoying watching David Chang squirm on Charlie Rose.
I'm kind of pleased that my mother-in-law and I share a lot of the same taste in music. Except for, you know, Toby Keith.
The best part about giving the dog a bath on a busy Manhattan sidewalk is that every person who walks by can't help smiling at a wet dog.
We just walked in off the street, purchased Dark Knight tickets with no line, and got great seats dead center in the theater. Easy!
Great day as a tech evangelist: Ran into an Apple store in a hurry and an employee stopped me to say they like *our* product.
so far today, our office has had genuine NYC bagels, genuine NYC pizza, and genuine NYC gourmet ice cream. soon we will be genuine NYC fat.
Hey, New Yorkers: Foo Bar at 6A NYC at 4:30pm. Come join us!
It never fails to delight me that a baker's dozen at our bagel shop is 14 giant bagels.
Pretty sure the reason my iPod battery sucks now is because it's burning all available power trying to fight my awesome Scrabble powers.
Will be a lot of stupidity over the NYer cover this week, mostly based on Remnick seeing it as art, and critics treating it as journalism.
Awesome rooftop cookout, running into @blogdiva on our block, live music in the park. No wonder they write songs about summer in NYC.
aw, that's sweet, this still works: http://itunes.ishavingamassage.com/
quite pleased @mike_ftw got his work onto the NYT's blog: http://icanhaz.com/bnl
if you said you loved Wall-E 2 weeks ago, but are disposing of a perfectly-working phone today, you may not have seen the same movie i did.
@ginatrapani @mathowie omg we were squeeing the whole time! it was actually kinda poorly done, culturally, but fun to watch.
hey, @mike_ftw, say something funny so we can all give you a pity favorite on twitter! rootin' for ya!
Nothing beats shipping.
@barackobama i won't believe you're in town until you tweet about going to Shake Shack.
Getting ready to join Dan Roam, Seth Godin, and Rich Sloan for a seminar. Call in and join us! http://icanhaz.com/seminar
Attention viral election video makers: It is now time to make a Madonna parody called "4 Months (To Save The World)". <jt>O-ba-ma. ...
I'm no astrophysicist, but calculations show that this rate of pork bbq consumption will turn me into a superdense black hole by March 2010.
As a public service: If your husband is a pro athlete, a member of the R&R Hall of Fame, or an emperor, then *yes*, he is cheating on you.
How do I get an army of interns and personal assistants? Clealry, this is what I need.
I'm generally in favor of Jay-Z's brand expansion, but I still can't believe he got so many highways to create Hov lanes.
@slice NYC has been very successful with a lifestyle that's radically different than most of the rest of the U.S. Others resent the affront.
Hmm, a Buchanan/Reform Party 2000 bumper sticker. Don't see too many of those in Manhattan. Did that guy ever become president?
The last of the neighbors' bottle rockets arc out over the sound, echoed by the boom of the thunderstorms across the water.
Scrounging up some bait to use to catch some fish, which we will then use as bait. Working our way up the food chain!
Happy 4th of July -- have you hugged an immigrant today?
If I call myself "The most powerful name in blogging!" would that sound awesome, like Fox News, or would it be damning with faint praise?
@seriouseats great job on Photograzing! Absolutely beautiful new site, plus it makes me hungry. http://icanhaz.com/grazr
Gatorade offers "Quiet Storm", a flavor of their Tiger (Woods) brand. Must be for rehydrating after making sweet interracial love. I'm sold!
I'm only giving updates to friends. Add me.
It worked! Getting all the righteous fury out of the way early clears the path for a relaxing day of work.
@otravers great story, and bezos definitely deserves props.
If I'm already furious and annoyed, and it's only 8am, can I count this as getting it out of the way for today?
@mchammer hey, i'm asian! i'm the target demographic! tell them i said hi.
Today was another day when NYC proved itself the best geek city around. Hooray!
@djacobs can you phrend me so I can see the walkthrough?
Gotta give props to the 13-year-old in the Mars Blackmon t-shirt. He was clearly raised right.
